altername_name: Test: Sei il Tipo di Madonna
name: Sei il Tipo di Madonna
overview: Are you like Madonna? Leafing through the biography of Madonna Luise Ciccone it is evident that she is quite eccentric. In fact, in the recounting of her past loves there are blonde and brown men, musicians like Dan Gilroy, disk-jockeys, drummers and actors like her current husband, Sean Penn. All varied from each other but united in by the fact that they are young, ambitious and full of artistic talent. If you want to know if you are similar to her you can take the quiz and see. It isn't that you won't answer correctly for yourself, you just might not be of the same type. Published in Italy in Edizione Logica 2000 Supplementi #04 - Speciale n.01 - Squinzie, Sfitinzie & Paninari 64.
